title: Ferbers
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Smart-casual setting in a nice residential part of Aachen next to a park. Reservations may be required on special dates. Menu is in German but has a symbols guideline at the bottom of the page for what's vegetarian and what's vegan. Around 6 vegan choices (2 soups, 3 pasta, 1 salad).
